channel.title: Bokeh on Pavithra
channel.description: Recent content in Bokeh on Pavithra

item.title: Data Visualization Introduction
item.description: Preface I started planning this series to share my data visualization lecture notes. But, over the past week, it has turned into something much bigger.

item.title: Importing Blogs to Medium
item.description: Bokeh recently decided to move it’s blog, hosted at https://blog.bokeh.org/, to the popular publishing platform Medium. This comes with a set of advantages and disadvantages, but we won’t go there today.
